text: mūsa tanṟe janatayēāṭ paṟaññat ōrkkuka: "enṟe janamē, niṅṅaḷentināṇ enne prayāsappeṭuttunnat? niścayamāyuṁ niṅṅaḷkkaṟiyāṁ; ñān niṅṅaḷilēkkuḷḷa daivadūtanāṇenn.” aṅṅane avar vaḻipiḻaccappēāḷ allāhu avaruṭe manas'sukaḷe nērvaḻiyilninn vyaticalippiccu. adharmakārikaḷe allāhu nērvaḻiyilākkukayilla
